extendedInfo.description: The official Android app of the North Carolina State Fair.Search for food, rides, exhibits, and other locations at the NC State Fair.  You can also see the event schedules and latest news from the NC State Fair blog and twitter.

reviews.title: Really terrible
reviews.comment: The map jumps all over while trying to touch one of the pins. Doesn\'t even show a user\'s current location. I\'d take a paper map over this any day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than nothing
reviews.comment: Tiny fonts, poor interface. Rudimentary search. Doesn\'t find some things, like the newest foods. Integration with Google maps would have been nice. It\'s a big place.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitchy and not useful
reviews.comment: You\'d expect to be able to use the map as you navigate the fair, but it never shows you where you are on the map. I wish they integrated with Google Maps Indoors on that one. Besides that, this app was glitchy on my phone in general. Overall, this felt rushed and incomplete.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Disappointed, especially since we love the fair and go every year. Poor performance, tiny unreadable text, lack of info, iOS interface, etc
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost completely useless
reviews.comment: In theory,  this app should be good. In practice,  its not. The overhead images used are of an empty parking lot, with pins to identify where things should be. Hard to navigate. Also,  WHY NO GPS?! Terrible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: Its better than nothing.. Its nice to be able to look and see where things are and exactly how many tickets each ride requires. It is very safe to say that the app needs a lot of improvement!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Font is too small,not readable. Text listing would be nice option to map. get to work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: IT\'S THE RIGHT STATE
reviews.comment: Don\'t be a F\'in Tool. Its the right state. Your cell phone isp is located in another state so google maps thinks that\'s your location. IT IS THE CORRECT STATE MORONS!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Wow, how do you release an app that is totally the wrong state?  i hope my state tax dollars didnt go into the making of this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wrong state
reviews.comment: I live in Raleigh and couldn\'t figure out the streets smh...it\'s not that hard to get the shape files!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wrong state fair!!!!!
reviews.comment: Indiana state fair ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: They didn\'t even check it out before offering it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs list
reviews.comment: Needs a list of things. Not just shown on map. List should lead to the map
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Not even N.C.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not even NC map
reviews.comment: How are you supposed to be able to find fair food and exhibits at the NC State fair if this app gives you an Indiana map? Was so disappointed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Poorly designed. Almost no usable info. Waste of time for this year. Hope next year is better!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wrong state fair
reviews.comment: Fix the auto zoom for the map please. The info is there just takes forever to pan over to raleigh.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wrong State
reviews.comment: For Indiana, not NC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still the wrong map
reviews.comment: Hard to tell where things for the NC state fait are at in INDIANA!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is my first year working a booth at the fair and even with the paper map I got lost but with this I can find a ride near by find it on the app and get to where I need to be thank you so much for makeing this app
reviews.author: A Google User
